Description_lang: Drinking the potion transforms the caster into a lava slime, pacifying them and reducing movement speed by $418403s2%. Grants immunity to fire hazards on the bridge in Lunedane.Attacking cancels this effect.
AuraDescription_lang: Transformed into a lava slime and pacified.Immune to fire hazards on the bridge in Lunedane.Movement speed reduced by $418403s2%.Attacking will cancel this effect.
